'Club Santos Laguna' is a Mexican football club. They represent the urban area
of Comarca Lagunera, which is made up of TorreÃ³n, GÃ³mez Palacio, and Lerdo.
Santos Laguna currently plays in the Liga MX. The club was founded in 1982, and
reached Mexico's top division after buying the franchise belonging to the
Ãngeles de Puebla. The club's debut in Mexico's top division was in the 1988/89
tournament. They have won the league championship four times: first in the
Invierno 1996 tournament, second in the Verano 2001 tournament, third in the
Clausura 2008 tournament, and the most recent in the Clausura 2012 tournament.
They have also reached the finals in the 1993â94 season, the Verano 2000
tournament, the Bicentenario 2010 tournament, the Apertura 2010 tournament, and
the Apertura 2011 tournament.

It is currently the fifth most popular team in Mexico according to the latest
poll by Consulta Mitofsky on February 17,
2013. [http://www.cronica.com.mx/notas/2013/731578.html Chivas y AmÃ©rica:
los mÃ¡s populares] (10 de marzo de 2013) (Spanish) Is ranked 74th in the
current world rankings Classification According to the IFFHS clubes. [http:-
//www.iffhs.de/?10f42e00fa2d17f73702fa3016e23c17f7370eff3702bb1c2bbb6f28f53512
IFFHS] Is considered the 4th best club XXI Century Concacaf zone and the
sixth CONCACAF team of the 1st Decade of the Century XXI.
